title: Russian blinis with caviar
ingredients: ['125g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2 eggs', '4 tablespoons caster sugar', '225ml milk', '225ml water', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon lemon juice', '4 tablespoons vegetable oil', 'oil, as needed for cooking', '100g butter, softened', '250g caviar']
